newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Computer Products started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Computer Products started.

text.p: -- Robertson Stephens & Co said analyst Keith Dunne has started coverage of Computer Products Inc with a long-term attractive rating and a price target of $26 a share.
-- Shares of Computer Products, a maker of power supply units for communications and computer equipment makers, were up 1-1/16 at 17-7/8 at mid-morning Tuesday.
-- In a statement, Dunne said core revenues should grow 20 percent a year as the company focuses on communications markets that currently account for 75 to 80 percent of sales.
-- Dunne expects acquisitions to boost long-term growth.
-- He sees 1996 earnings at $0.78 a share, and 1997 at $1.
